page.title: 11RECREATION IN WOOLSTON
page.content:
{Woolston Leisure Centre.}
The centre was built in two parts. The main hall and squash courts were finished in 1972. The two swimming pools were ready in 1975.
The sports facilities currently available include squash, weight and fitness room, table tennis, popmobility, circuit training, netball, indoor bowls and karate.
The main hall is also used for social functions such as discotheques, wedding receptions, dog shows, bingo, and public meetings.
A creche is planned, so too is a new health room with sunbeds.
